about_the_game:
The price of this OST is actually what I really want to set to the game. Own this if you really like my game, thx : )
I prepared 2 pieces of extra music which do not appear in the game :Ｄ
Track List
01. Accel Angel
02. Black Dead Butterfly
03. Chase the Unlight
04. Corridor Of Dusk
05. Crossing Angel
06. Flame For Blame
07. Flickering Gate (Lamentina Theme)
08. Misty Blossom
09. Sunlight Burner
10. The Afternoon
11. The Dawn
12. The Dim Light
13. The Night Of Apocalypse
14. The Prayer Of Ixya
15. The Raster Of Sistine
16. Unfaithful Dusk
